name: The Chalice of Magica
description: Welcome to MagicLand where magic is possible and easy to use. You will be Wango, a young mage that is one of the strongest mages ever seen. You can control lightning magica and use it at your will. Darth, an evil mage stole your secret chalice which gives you unlimited powers, so you must steal it back. He is at the dark tower of evil across the river. Find him, kill him, and take back your chalice.
